testcase.classname: Validate View, Edit and Delete functionality
testcase.name: View an existing deal
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User Enters valid credentials..........................................passed And User selects Deals section from sidebar menu............................passed Then User should be redirected to Deals dashboard...........................passed When User selects the deal from dashboard by clicking on view icon..........passed Then Existing deal should be visible with all details.......................passed

testcase.classname: Validate View, Edit and Delete functionality
testcase.name: Edit an existing deal
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User Enters valid credentials..........................................passed And User selects Deals section from sidebar menu............................passed Then User should be redirected to Deals dashboard...........................passed When User selects the deal from dashboard by clicking on edit icon..........passed Then User should be able to edit the deal...................................passed

testcase.classname: Validate View, Edit and Delete functionality
testcase.name: Delete an existing deal
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User Enters valid credentials..........................................passed And User selects Deals section from sidebar menu............................passed Then User should be redirected to Deals dashboard...........................passed When User selects the deal from dashboard by clicking on delete icon........passed Then User should be able to see deal in bin.................................passed
